doc:
Pierre-Benoist Varoclier https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pierre-Benoist_Varoclier 0 Pierre-Benoist Varoclier (born April 30, 1983 in Fontainebleau, France) is a French actor and theatre director.Varoclier first studied economics and philosophy in business school, at École Normale Supérieure, at Harvard University, and at Bristol University. He began his career as an auditor in a large American firm, but chose not to pursue this career path. Consequently, he trained as an actor at the London Academy of Music and Dramatic Art (LAMDA, Class of 2008) and at the Conservatoire National Supérieur d'Art Dramatique (CNSAD, Class of 2009) in Paris. Varoclier was elected Talent Cannes in 2012 at the Cannes Film Festival. Pierre-Benoist_Varoclier ( born April_30 , 1983 in Fontainebleau , France ) is a_French_actor_and_theatre_director.Varoclier first studied economics and philosophy in business_school , at École_Normale_Supérieure , at Harvard_University , and at Bristol_University . He began his_career as an_auditor in a_large_American_firm , but chose not to_pursue this_career_path . Consequently , he trained as an_actor at the_London_Academy of Music and Dramatic_Art_(_LAMDA , Class of 2008_) and at the_Conservatoire_National_Supérieur_d'Art_Dramatique_(_CNSAD , Class of 2009_) in Paris . Varoclier was_elected Talent_Cannes in 2012 at the_Cannes_Film_Festival .
